Using cheat-engine to find old AOB then just replace with new one.

old: 65 00 30 00 34 00 36 00 38 00 33 00 62 00 62 00 61 00 63 00 62 00 36 00 37 00 64 00 32 00 62 00 31 00 63 00 62 00 31 00 30 00 65 00 31 00 39 00 39 00 65 00 35 00 62 00 33 00 64 00 63 00 62
new: 36 00 66 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 37 00 38 00 61 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 32 00 64 00 31 00 66 00 33 00 32 00 31 00 38 00 39 00 62 00 64 00 32 00 63 00 30 00 31 00 63 00 39 00 34 00 63 00 62

When the game server ask for password then input: anuwat
